name: Nowhere Patrol
description: Nowhere Patrol is a boss rush game with bullet hell and platforming elements. Inspired by classic action arcade games with it's steep difficulty curve and non-stop action.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
